resources.string: No EPUB files found in your Zotero library
You can find your Zotero API key at:\nhttps://www.zotero.org/settings/keys
To use this app, you need to enter your Zotero credentials in the Settings.
• View all your EPUB books at a glance\n• Tap any cover to open the book in your Zotero Web Library\n• Pull down to refresh your collection
This app was developed by Øyvind Solheim (@Oyvindbs@nerdculture.de) with a lot of help from the Claude AI. See the code or propose changes on https://www.github.com/oyvindbso/zoteview
Enjoy ZotEView? Buy me a coffee: https://buymeacoffee.com/oyvindbs or propose new features/code on gihub (above).
Zotero EPUB Covers displays all your EPUB books from your Zotero library in a convenient grid view.
